functions.singleLossFunctions package¶

Submodules¶

functions.singleLossFunctions.Single_Loss_Function_Choice module¶

functions.singleLossFunctions.Single_Loss_Function_Choice.Single_Loss_Function_Choice(choice, params, experimentComp, solver='Lin', factor=1, spacialDiff=30, timeDiff=3000, time=10800)[source]¶

Function allowing to choose between loss function based on choice parameter Choices: ‘Simple’ - Single_Loss_Function_Simple ‘Squares’ - Single_Loss_Function_Squares ‘LogSimple’ - Single_Loss_Function_LogSimple ‘LogSquares’ - Single_Loss_Function_LogSquares Other choices will raise an exception

functions.singleLossFunctions.Single_Loss_Function_LogSimple module¶

functions.singleLossFunctions.Single_Loss_Function_LogSimple.Single_Loss_Function_LogSimple(params, experimentComp, solver, factor, spacialDiff, timeDiff, time)[source]¶

Calculates a loss value, representing difference between experimental and model data with given parameters. Natural log is applied to final value.

functions.singleLossFunctions.Single_Loss_Function_LogSquares module¶

functions.singleLossFunctions.Single_Loss_Function_LogSquares.Single_Loss_Function_LogSquares(params, experimentComp, solver, factor, spacialDiff, timeDiff, time)[source]¶

Calculates a loss value, representing difference between experimental and model data with given parameters. Summed values are squared. Natural log is applied to final value.

functions.singleLossFunctions.Single_Loss_Function_Simple module¶

functions.singleLossFunctions.Single_Loss_Function_Simple.Single_Loss_Function_Simple(params, experimentComp, solver, factor, spacialDiff, timeDiff, time)[source]¶

Calculates a loss value, representing difference between experimental and model data with given parameters.

functions.singleLossFunctions.Single_Loss_Function_Squares module¶

functions.singleLossFunctions.Single_Loss_Function_Squares.Single_Loss_Function_Squares(params, experimentComp, solver, factor, spacialDiff, timeDiff, time)[source]¶

Calculates a loss value, representing difference between experimental and model data with given parameters. Summed values are squared.
